ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando table update
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the drum as well. Here s hard facts on the Mistmoore Battle Drum - same weight (0.5) as a hand drum, but definitely gives some increase in speed over
ygData.messageBody:
I have the drum as well. Here's hard facts on the Mistmoore Battle Drum - same
weight (0.5) as a hand drum, but definitely gives some increase in speed over the
handdrum when using selo's, and a documentable feature would be when using either
Guardian or Elemental Rhythms it boosts resist by 5 points MORE than a handdrum.

What exactly is this noticable effect you refer to with the Lute of the Gypsy
Princess? There is no difference at all with Hymn of Restoration, nor with any
other song as far as I can tell. I am Level 27. Feel free to quntify your
statement with something more useful then "it does extra stuff".

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

>
> well the lute does have an effect, and it is pretty noticeble. ditto with
> the drums. I am pretty sure a lvl limit is in effect here though.
>
> Gendal Concorden, lvl 39 bard
